column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My desire for savory pastries still goes strong
column2: but I feel it'd be unfair not to bump the rating up to five well-earned stars after my lunch here today. I had a spectacularly tasty shrimp remoulade today with capers
column4: and mixed greens that may well be the best shrimp salad I've had anywhere. I also had the fruit croissant again
column5: mainly on account of the fact that it looks a bit different now (from afar
column6: it looks like french toast on steroids)
column7: and it absolutely blew me away. Far better than the last one I'd had
column8: with a much more delicate (but still very tasty) cherry jam and an even denser
column9: smoother dough that nearly brought this grown man to tears. I'd like to shake someone's hand. Congratulations are in order.
